sourcesContent: import { Component, ElementRef, ViewChild} from '@angular/core'; import { SlickCarouselComponent } from 'ngx-slick-carousel'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'] }) export class HomeComponent { images: any[] = [ {img: './../../../assets/images/carousel_slide1.jpg'}, {img: './../../../assets/images/carousel_slide2.jpg'}, {img: './../../../assets/images/carousel_slide3.jpg'} ]; currentSlide = 0; constructor() {} ngOnInit(): void {} onSlideChange(event: any) { this.currentSlide = event.currentSlide; } goToSlide(index: number) { this.currentSlide = index; } }
